page.title: 17Hobbies (Brockhampton)
page.content: There are lots of hobbies that people on Bringsty do.Here are some of the hobbies that us children do out of Bringsty :swimming (this is quite a popular hobby).We go to Leominster, Lowerwick and Tenbury.These are some of the hobbies that we do inside : knitting,drawing,stamps and origami (there are a few various collections). There are alot of Dad's hobbies outside and in :photography,cards, woodwork,metalwork,gardening,darts, wine and cider making.Cider making on Bringsty is traditional.Damson picking is also traditional although not many people do it now. Pub games are also popular although there are only very few people on the actual common.Here are some of them : cribbage,pool,dominoes and phatt. Most of those games are played with cards but there are other games.
